input.sentences: this flyer is about a fair for mushrooms .
mushrooms are fungus that grow that happen to be delicious .
there are so many different kinds of mushrooms .
some mushrooms if eaten have certain affects on people .
this is a nice painted poster of a red mushroom .
output.sentences: I saw a flyer announcing the annual mushroom fair.
The fair will happen on Friday when you can learn how to grow mushrooms.
The fair will display all kinds of mushrooms.
The fair is popular so many mushrooms will be eaten by the people in attendance.
Thank goodness we have that big painted red poster announcing the fair.
